> Whenever I try to run this test, I get the following error message:
> java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: mbf/util/XmlDocument
> (Unsupported major.minor version 48.0)

You'd do better to ask this question in a Dom4J forum.

The error means that the code was compiled with "-source 1.4", but run with
a pre-1.4 JVM.  Try running your test suite with a 1.4 or newer JVM.

Mike Bresnahan
subject: Re: Class Cast Exception
